reviews.review_msg: Dr brockman is a great prof. He is very chill and cares for students. His lectures are very well structured and not messy at all which is important for this course. He teaches in a way so you can learn a lot while getting a good grade. Exams were straight forward and he might add bonus questions too. I wish more profs had his teaching style.

Dr. Brockman is really nice during office hours and explains stuff well. His lectures are well structured and he makes the complicated pathways easy to understand. His exams are very fair and straightforward too. All the questions from the exams were stuff talked about in lecture and the questions tell you what main points to talk about.
Amazing prof. Very very fair exams take 326 with him if possible. lectures get content-heavy at times but does his best to explain them
Great prof! Very clear lectures and powerpoints; very fair exams.

Fantastic prof. He explains the slides very throughly, available for questions after class. The thing I really appreciated was that he takes his time to highlight important concepts in all his slides. Exams were extremely fair. Fall in love with the immune system after this class. I can't recommend him enough. Also cares a lot about his students.

Not bad of a prof; he seems nice and accessible after class. Oftentimes he reads off his slides but that's just a minor thing to consider about him. Communication on tutorials, exams, and cancelled classes needs to be improved, but he is overall good enough to take a class with.
